title: Highly efficient Ru-decorated CeO2 for photocatalytic hydrogenation and cyclization of levulinic acid to γ-valerolactone
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01041H, Paper
Ganesh Sunil More, Rajram Bal, Rajendra Srivastava
In 1Ru/CeO2, conduction band electrons transfer to Ru, aiding Ru–H bond dissociation and reducing the ketonic group of LA while holes cleave the C–O bond of –COOH, forming a carbonyl radical that cyclizes to GVL.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
